Package org.terrier.statistics

Provides the implementations of various statistical routines.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GammaFunction
    Base class for implementations of the Gamma function.

Package org.terrier.statistics Description

Provides the implementations of various statistical routines. In particular, the Gamma function is implemented.
